vernac_cmds: Ltac cnf2 f := match f with | ?A \/ (?B /\ ?C) => let c1 := cnf2 (A\/B) in let c2 := cnf2 (A\/C) in constr:(c1/\c2) | (?B /\ ?C) \/ ?A => let c1 := cnf2 (B\/A) in let c2 := cnf2 (C\/A) in constr:(c1/\c2) | (?A \/ ?B) \/ ?C => let c1 := cnf2 (B\/C) in cnf2 (A \/ c1) | _ => f end with cnf f := match f with | ?A \/ ?B => let c1 := cnf A in let c2 := cnf B in cnf2 (c1 \/ c2) | ?A /\ ?B => let c1 := cnf A in let c2 := cnf B in constr:(c1 /\ c2) | _ => f end.
